chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> cF (Br1 m x x') z = (if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x) z then cA_1 m one x' else if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x') z then cA_1 m one x else cF m z)

Premises:
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
cF = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec
Br1 = fun (m : fmap) (x x' : dart) => if succ_dec m zero x then if succ_dec m zero x' then B (L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x)) zero x' else B m zero x else B m zero x' : fmap -> dart -> dart -> fmap
cA_1 = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA_1 m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq
eq_dart_dec : forall n m : nat, {n = m} + {n <> m}
double_link = fun (m : fmap) (x x' : dart) => x <> x' /\ expe m x x' : fmap -> dart -> dart -> Prop
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
dart = nat : Set
cA0_1_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> cA_1 (Br1 m x x') zero z = (if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x) z then x' else if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x') z then x else cA_1 m zero z)
cA0_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> cA (Br1 m x x') zero z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then cA m zero x' else if eq_dart_dec x' z then cA m zero x else cA m zero z)
cF_L : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m k x y -> cF (L m k x y) z = (if eq_dim_dec k zero then cA_1 m one (if eq_dart_dec y z then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m zero x) z then cA_1 m zero y else cA_1 m zero z) else if eq_dart_dec y (cA_1 m zero z) then x else if eq_dart_dec (cA m one x) (cA_1 m zero z) then cA_1 m one y else cA_1 m one (cA_1 m zero z))
cF_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cF (B m k x) z = (if eq_dim_dec k zero then cA_1 (B m zero x) one (if eq_dart_dec (A m zero x) z then top m zero x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m zero x) z then x else cA_1 m zero z) else if eq_dart_dec (A m one x) (cA_1 (B m one x) zero z) then top m one x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m one x) (cA_1 (B m one x) zero z) then x else cA_1 m one (cA_1 (B m one x) zero z))
cF_L1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let x10 := cF_1 m x in let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in let m1 := L m one x y in cF m1 z = (if eq_dart_dec y0 z then x else if eq_dart_dec x10 z then y_1 else cF m z)
cA1_1_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 (Br1 m x x') one z = cA_1 m one z
cA_cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z) /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
cF_L0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in betweenf m x_1 z y -> cF (L m zero x y) z = (if eq_dart_dec y z then x_1 else cF m z)
cA_1_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA_1 (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec (A m k x) z then top m k x else if eq_dart_dec (bottom m k x) z then x else cA_1 m k z)
cA1_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA (Br1 m x x') one z = cA m one z
planar_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> planar m -> x <> x' -> planar (Br1 m x x')
cA_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z)
cF_L0_2 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 -> cF (L m zero x y) z = (if eq_dart_dec x0 z then y_0_1 else cF m z)
A_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> A (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then nil else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then bottom m k x else A m k z)
inv_hmap_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> inv_hmap (Br1 m x x')
double_link_succ : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> succ m zero x \/ succ m zero x'
double_link_comm : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> double_link m x' x
double_link_exd : forall (m : fmap) (x x' : dart), inv_hmap m -> double_link m x x' -> exd m x /\ exd m x'
exd_Br1 : forall (m : fmap) (x x' z : dart), exd m z < -> exd (Br1 m x x') z
top_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (H : inv_hmap m), succ m zero x -> exd m z -> x <> z -> let m0 := L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x) in top m0 zero z = (if MA0.expo_dec m x z H then x else top m zero z)
bottom_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (H : inv_hmap m), succ m zero x -> exd m z -> x <> z -> let m0 := L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x) in bottom m0 zero z = (if MA0.expo_dec m x z H then A m zero x else bottom m zero z)
cA_1_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA_1 m k z = (if pred_dec m k z then A_1 m k z else top m k z)
cA_1_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cA_1 m k (cA m k z) = z
cA_eq : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> cA m k z = (if succ_dec m k z then A m k z else bottom m k z)
y_0_1_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), let m1 := L m zero x y in inv_hmap m1 -> cF m y = cA_1 m1 one (top m1 zero x)
cF_1 = fun (m : fmap) (z : dart) => cA m zero (cA m one z) : fmap -> dart -> dart
cF_L_B_top_bot : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cF (L (B m k x) k (top m k x) (bottom m k x)) z = cF m z
cF_cF_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF m (cF_1 m z) = z
McF.f_f_1 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> cF m (cF_1 m z) = z
cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cF (L (B m k x) k x y) z = cF m z
exd_cA_cA_1 : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> exd m (cA m k z) /\ exd m (cA_1 m k z)
cF_I : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (u : tag) (p : point), inv_hmap m -> prec_I m x -> exd m z -> x <> z -> cF (I m x u p) z = cF m z
exd_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z < -> exd m (cA m k z)
between_expf_L0 : forall (m : fmap) (x y z t : dart), inv_hmap (L m zero x y) -> let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let y_0_1 := cF m y in let x0 := cA m zero x in betweenf m x_1 z y /\ betweenf m x_1 t y \/ betweenf m y_0_1 z x0 /\ betweenf m y_0_1 t x0 -> expf (L m zero x y) z t
expf_xb0_xh0_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in expf m xb0 xh0_1
expf_B0_CS_2_b_ind : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let xh0 := top m zero x in let xh0_1 := cA_1 m one xh0 in ~ expf m x0 xb0 -> let t := Iter (cF m) i z in ~ expf m x_1 z -> ~ expf m xh0_1 z -> expf (B m zero x) z t
planar_L_B_top_bot_0 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> planar m -> planar (L (B m zero x) zero (top m zero x) (bottom m zero x))
expf_y0_y_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> prec_L m one x y -> let y0 := cA m zero y in let y_1 := cA_1 m one y in expf m y0 y_1
expf_x0_x_1 : forall (m : fmap) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in expf m x0 x_1
expf_B0_CS_1_c_prel : forall (m : fmap) (x z : dart) (i : nat), inv_hmap m -> succ m zero x -> exd m z -> let x0 := cA m zero x in let xb0 := bottom m zero x in let x_1 := cA_1 m one x in let t := Iter (cF m) i z in expf m x0 xb0 -> ~ expf m x_1 z -> expf (B m zero x) z t

```  
intros m x x' z Hmap Hlink.
unfold cF.
unfold Br1.
case_eq (succ_dec m zero x); intro Hx.
+ case_eq (succ_dec m zero x'); intro Hx'.
  * unfold cA. simpl. rewrite Hx. rewrite Hx'. simpl.
    rewrite cA0_Br1; auto. rewrite cA0_1_Br1; auto.
  * unfold cA. simpl. rewrite Hx. rewrite Hx'. simpl.
    rewrite cA0_Br1; auto. rewrite cA0_1_Br1; auto.
+ unfold cA. simpl. rewrite Hx.
  destruct Hlink as [Hne Hexp]. contradiction.
Qed.  
```

original: intros m x x' z Hmap Hlink. unfold cF. unfold Br1. case_eq (succ_dec m zero x); intro Hx. + case_eq (succ_dec m zero x'); intro Hx'. * unfold cA. simpl. rewrite Hx. rewrite Hx'. simpl. rewrite cA0_Br1; auto. rewrite cA0_1_Br1; auto. * unfold cA. simpl. rewrite Hx. rewrite Hx'. simpl. rewrite cA0_Br1; auto. rewrite cA0_1_Br1; auto. + unfold cA. simpl. rewrite Hx. destruct Hlink as [Hne Hexp]. contradiction.
